titles.title: Volunteer Firefighters' Protection Act of 2005
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income health care subsidy payments made to employers by local governments on behalf of volunteer firefighters.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/21/2005--Introduced. Volunteer Firefighters' Protection Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from the gross income of an employer certain health care subsidy payments paid by a local government to an employer on behalf of a volunteer firefighter.
